data.title: Sister Sunday Meeting – New Muslim Circle
data.text:
Na’ima B. Robert is a trail-blazing speaker, coach and best-selling author of ‘From My Sisters’ Lips’, as well as over 25 other books that have been translated into over 14 languages. She is the recipient of several literary awards and is a respected author of diverse fiction and the author of the forthcoming ‘Show Up: A Motivational Message for Muslim Women’.

She was the founder of SISTERS Magazine and Editor-in-Chief for ten years, touching the lives of thousands of readers and launching the careers of dozens of writers.

She has appeared on BBC’s Newsnight, GMTV and on several BBC radio stations. Her work has been published on Thrive Global, in The Guardian, The Times and The Telegraph. She has been profiled in The Independent and Stylist Magazine and has been a regular guest on a variety of TV stations.

As a high level coach and book coach, she uses her training and experience to help women all over the world show up strong, tell their story and share their message with the world.
